Title: Coco Before Chanel
Writer: Edmonde Charles-Roux (book), Anne Fontaine, Camille Fontaine
Actors: Audrey Tautou, Benoît Poelvoorde, Alessandro Nivola, Marie Gillain
Plot: The story of Coco Chanel's rise from obscure beginnings to the heights of the fashion world.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 5 wins & 19 nominations.
Production: France 2 (FR2), Le Tax Shelter du Gouvernement Fédéral de Belgique, France 2 Cinéma, Films Distribution, Banque Populaire Images 9, SCOPE Invest, Warner Bros., Soficapital, Cofinova 5, Haut et Court, Canal+, Ciné, Scope Pictures, CinéCinéma
